instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open a document in the Google Docs app . Select the text you want to change. On the toolbar, tap Format . Tap TEXT and then Style . Tap a text style: Normal text Title Subtitle Heading 1-6 The text style will be updated.

From the Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'Device,' then Display. If necessary, tap Automatic brightness to clear the Check box and turn off. Touch and drag the Brightness level Slider to the desired setting.

From the Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'Device,' then Display . Tap Screen timeout . Select the desired time setting: 15 seconds 30 seconds 1 minute 2 minutes 5 minutes 10 minutes

From any home screen, touch and hold a vacant spot. Tap Widgets . A list of available widgets appears, tap and long press of the option you want on the Homescreen. Slide the widget into place and release your finger.
From any home screen, touch and hold a vacant spot Tap Wallpapers . Tap Home screen . Select from one of the available options including pre-installed and Gallery images. Tap SET AS WALLPAPER .
From any home screen, touch and hold a vacant spot Tap Wallpapers . Tap Lock screen . Select from one of the available options including pre-installed and Gallery images. Tap SET AS WALLPAPER .
